I am a PhD student affiliated with University of Stuttgart and my supervisor is Prof. Holger Steeb. 


### Key topics

- Porous Media
- Computational Fluid Mechanics (CFD)
- Continuum Mechanics
- Fluid Structure Interaction (FSI)

### Education

- PhD student (2021.11 - Present) - University of Stuttgart
- Master of Science (2017.09 - 2020.07) - Geological Engineering - China University of Geosciences (Beijing)
